writeAllHybridizingPairsToTableWithOverlaps

public void writeAllHybridizingPairsToTableWithOverlaps(java.lang.String outTable,
                                                        int minAlignLength,
                                                        float minPctIdentity,
                                                        java.lang.String overlapperBed)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException
Write a table of pairs of coordinates that hybridize (midpoint of intervals in transcript coordinates)

Parameters:
outTable - File to write table to
minAlignLength - Min alignment length
minPctIdentity - Min percent identity
overlapperBed - Bed file of overlapper annotations to check. Table will include a column for neither, one (x coord) or both genes overlap a region from bed file
Throws:
java.io.IOException
